<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofpr </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.75</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sounds </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Briefing </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr3</name>=<value> Event Handlers </value></part><part><name>GROUP3</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Select a sound declared in the [[Description.ext#Sound|Description.ext]] of the mission to be played the first time the [[Briefing.html#Notes|Notes tab]] is selected in the [[Briefing.html|briefing]]. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''onBriefingNotes''' soundName </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> soundName: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[onBriefingNotes]] "NotesVoiceOver";</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[Description.ext#Sounds|CfgSounds]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>

<h3 style="display:none">Notes</h3>
<dl class="command_description">
